sentences.en: A case might be made for the blackface minstrel show vaudeville or for the entertainments of some medicine shows camivals and riverboats as american folk drama.
sentences.cn: 滑稽说唱团演出、杂耍演出，或一些娱乐性的药品巡回演出、表演会与内河游艺船等，均可作为美国民间戏剧的例证。

sentences.en: Do you know the names of any other stars from that vaudeville era?
sentences.cn: 你知道在那个时候表演过的杂耍演员 吗 ?

sentences.en: For the next fifteen years she sang and danced in both Broadway and vaudeville shows.
sentences.cn: 在此后的十五年中，她分别在百老汇和歌舞杂耍中演出。

sentences.en: He had had a piece rejected at the Vaudeville.
sentences.cn: 他写过一篇戏剧,被滑稽剧院退了回来.

sentences.en: If the euro zone wants its currency to survive, it must stem the panic and make Italy’s vaudeville politics credible.
sentences.cn: 如果欧元区希望它们的货币幸存，它必须遏制恐慌并使得意大利的杂耍般的政治变得可信。

sentences.en: In 1901, he broke out of vaudeville and set his sights on Broadway.
sentences.cn: 1901年，他放弃了杂耍表演，决定到百老汇发展。

sentences.en: In 1925 Burns met the vaudeville actress Grace ( Gracie ) Allen, whom he married the following year.
sentences.cn: 1925年,伯恩斯邂逅另一位轻喜剧女演员格雷斯 ( 格雷西 ) -艾伦, 于次年结婚.

sentences.en: Target girl is a term sometimes used in circus and vaudeville to denote a female assistant in "impalement" acts such as knife throwing, archery or sharpshooting.
sentences.cn: 标靶女郎是有时用于马戏团和杂耍的一个词语，指的是在飞刀，射箭或飞镖之类“飞刺”节目中的女助手。

sentences.en: Tell her you're abdul abdullah who used to be a mind reader in vaudeville.
sentences.cn: 告诉她你是阿布·阿度拉,常常在杂技团表演读心术.

sentences.en: The piano player for the theater was a former vaudeville performer named Cora Salisbury.
sentences.cn: 剧团的钢琴演奏者是以前歌舞杂技的艺员,叫卡拉·赛拉斯贝瑞.

sentences.en: The room was decorated with pictures of vaudeville celebrities.
sentences.cn: 这个房间有轻歌舞剧明星的照片装饰.
这只是用歌舞谐谑来表达历史.

sentences.en: Vaudeville shows presented short plays , singers , comedians who made people laugh and other acts.

words.tran_cn: 杂耍演员；轻歌舞剧编剧者
杂耍；轻歌舞剧；歌舞杂耍表演

trans.tran_en: a type of theatre entertainment, popular from the 1880s to the 1950s, in which there were many short performances of different kinds, including singing, dancing, jokes etc
